channel.title: Jobs London Personal on Gonzalo's thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Jobs London Personal on Gonzalo's thoughts

item.title: Changes
item.description: A few days ago my company sent out this press release . It seems to be rather unimportant, but for me it means changes. I work for that specific business unit. I cannot write too much. Because I don’t know too much, but also because I don’t want to tell too much. But there are some topics I would like to raise. In Spain, if your work is good and the company is doing great, whatever happens in between, has little importance.
